remarks: Lemma for ~ lcfr .  Condition needed more than once.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Mar-2015.)
statement:
lcfrlem17.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcfrlem17.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcfrlem17.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcfrlem17.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
lcfrlem17.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` U ) $.
lcfrlem17.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
lcfrlem17.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` U ) $.
lcfrlem17.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` U ) $.
lcfrlem17.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcfrlem17.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
lcfrlem17.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
lcfrlem17.ne $e |- ( ph -> ( N ` { X } ) =/= ( N ` { Y } ) ) $.
lcfrlem17 $p |- ( ph -> ( X .+ Y ) e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
